name: Live Messenger Winks File
summary: Learn about .MCO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Winks may be installed using Messenger Jump! MSN Winks Installer or MSN BackUp.
NOTE: Windows Live Messenger was discontinued in 2013 and has moved to Skype.

description: Contains Flash-based animations, called Winks, that can be sent using Windows Live Messenger (formerly MSN Messenger); similar to sending an emoticon, but can be a much larger animation.
